title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 May 2016 - XWiki
content:
<Aranjedeath-> has joined #xwiki  
01:25 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
01:44 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
01:48 <OSIMasson> Hi, in xwiki 7: Trying to remove restrictions on a page which limited viewing only to my group. I am in "Administration: Rights: Page". When I try to uncheck the view box, I get "You are about to deny the view right for [a group I am in]. This implies denying your own view right, if you are part of this group. Continue?" If I continue I will block myself from viewing the page?  
01:48 <lkrejci> has quit  
01:50 <IndyMorning> has joined #xwiki  
01:55 <OSIMasson> how can I clear all "green checks" from a page' rights?  
01:56 <OSIMasson> when I try, the next icon i a "red cross out" icon which block my own access  
01:58 <OSIMasson> trying to find answer here: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/AccessRights  
02:00 <OSIMasson> I am trying " to clear the right and use the default values." The check box I am trying to clear i for a group I am in. So when I click the green check box I get, "You are about to deny the view right for [a group I am in]. This implies denying your own view right, if you are part of this group. Continue?"  
02:52 <IndyMorning> has quit  
06:47 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:10 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:28 <woshilapin> has quit  
08:55 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:02 <vmassol> good morning  
09:09 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <vmassol> note: we have this week to finalize 8.1RC1 and then release on next Monday  
09:26 <vmassol> FTR I've played with docker over the week end (I've received my docker for mac executable :)) and I'm not far from being able to publish a working docker compose  
09:54 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:09 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <lkrejci> has quit  
11:31 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:32 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:06 <Signum> Is there a way to display the reference of a page? We'd like to include a page in the dashboard using the "Display" gadget. But we can't figure out how to properly address a certain document.  
12:07 <Signum> It's 7.4.1.
